thread.title: Peyton Manning on brink of tying all-time wins record - News Sentinel
thread.title_full: Peyton Manning on brink of tying all-time wins record - News Sentinel Story

author: Ian McCue, 247Sports
title: Peyton Manning on brink of tying all-time wins record - News Sentinel
text:
Before this season ends, Peyton Manning should have more wins than any other quarterback in NFL history.
In his 17-plus seasons, Manning has racked up 185 wins. The all-time leader is Packers legend Brett Favre with 186. The Broncos passer will have a chance to tie the record against Favre's former team, as Green Bay comes to Denver on Nov. 1 following the bye. He could then break the record in a Week 9 road matchup against the Colts, where Manning spent the first 14 seasons of his pro career.
Continue reading at GoVols247 .
